name: Speedy Xtreme Highway Cars Adventure Compititions
name_original: Speedy Xtreme Highway Cars Adventure Compititions
description:
This is the new generation of car racing games,bring fast driving experience to a whole drift car to be the king of racing game.On this game have lots fun and racing craze to entertain you fully.This amazingly realistic racing car driving simulation game is packed full of super cool fast race cars and exciting,Drive through the hilly ground some extreme jumps and tricky path.Be a rally traffic racer this is ultimate Rally high speed Racing.Go flat out through the dirt of the racing track get sideways on the hard and twisty road for a seriously entertaining drive.All soil track dirt off road vehicle types deliver unique and very interesting flavors.Rally Racer introduces best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game.
On the game haven multiple monsters cars drifting riding,and stunt racing in this game, dynamic racing challenging levels.Enjoy insane trucking experience in absolute best car drifting and racing along with increasing difficulty at every level of hill dirt rally racing.Challenge the around car racers, be winner and believe you can win the game in all of the mode.Have fun with drift and realistic tuned physics.This Rally Dirt racing is a drift based rally game.
The faster you drive the more scores you get. As many laps you get more score you get. Avoid to crash and you get Perfect Lap. Play on your style and become a best rally stunt racer.
Features:
-Best high speed real dirt driving
-High quality 3D beautiful stunning graphics
-extreme fast
-easy control
